title: How to Be Good at Crysis 2

steps.headline: Learn how to free run.
steps.description: Crysis 2 has a free running mechanic that lets you climb over things, jump crazy distances and slide on the ground, use this to surprise your enemy. There's a wall where a campers hiding behind, jump over it and take him from behind.

steps.headline: Learn cloaking, armor and super jump.
steps.description: These abilities are very useful, when in the open use cloak to get across fast, or when in a firefight, tip the balance in your favor with armor enhancement. Gap in front of you, super jump over it by holding jump. Use these moves to help you and your team.

steps.headline: Fight creatively.
steps.description: The game rewards creativity, you get bonus xp and it looks cool. Jump over walls to get the advantage on 2 guys suppressing your team. This will greatly increase your dominance on the battlefield

steps.headline: Fight from all angles.
steps.description: Since the massive maps are both vertical and horizontal, expect to be fired upon from all angles. I flank the enemy from above then drop down right on top of them, very useful.

steps.headline: Kidner Surprise.
steps.description: Often times when an enemy is engaging your team, they won't expect a guy right in front of them, go cloak and run at them from the side, stay out of line of fire though.

steps.headline: Snipe with minimum or almost no loss of your suit's cloak energy.
steps.description: Find a clear and level point on a map where you can actually lay for a while , use visor to tag almost every enemy whether close or far away. Do all this in cloak mode.

steps.headline: If you have "Nano recharge" module in your suit's unlocked menu, activate that module.
steps.description: The reason for using the "nano-recharge" module is in case you failed to armor during shooting and drained your energy, the nano-recharge will help you to fill suit's power quickly, so that you can go in cloak again for little time to shake off your pursuers.

steps.headline: Plan how you will start sniping.
steps.description: This means taking out the far guys or close ones. The far guys are best taken out first.

steps.headline: Crouch.
steps.description: This is important because crouching stabilizes your aim much better.

steps.headline: Activate your cloak.
steps.description: (This is crucial.) Aim your sniper scope and use nanovision to find out where you will the target.

steps.headline: Right before you shoot , switch to armor mode.
steps.description: This is because your suit's power will not drain in armor mode during sniping.

steps.headline: After you have shot at the target, switch back to cloak mode.
steps.description: This whole procedure of "Aim - Armor - Shoot - Cloak" should be done in a fraction of seconds.

steps.headline: If you successfully do this, your notoriety level is not going to increase.
steps.description: This technique requires lot of practice; one failed move, namely "Shoot in cloak mode - leads to power drainage immediately" or "Failed to cloak after shoot - leads to exposure of your sniping position. If that happens, change your position with any other backup location.
